body.query: query($representations: [_Any!]!){_entities(representations: $representations){__typename ... on Employee {hobbies {__typename ... on Exercise {category} ... on Flying {planeModels yearsOfExperience} ... on Gaming {name genres yearsOfExperience} ... on Programming {languages} ... on Travelling {countriesLived {__typename key {name}}} ... on Other {name}}}}}
